name: Death Domain
description: Clerics of the Death domain wield negative energy and command the forces of decay.

1.name: Reaper
1.description: Learn one necromancy cantrip. When you cast a necromancy cantrip that targets one creature, you can instead target two creatures within 5 feet of each other.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Touch of Death
2.description: When you hit with a melee attack, use Channel Divinity to deal extra necrotic damage equal to 5 + twice your cleric level.

6.name: Inescapable Destruction
6.description: Necrotic damage you deal with cleric spells and Channel Divinity ignores resistance.

8.name: Divine Strike
8.description: Once on each of your turns, deal an extra 1d8 necrotic damage on a weapon attack (2d8 at 14th level).

17.name: Improved Reaper
17.description: When you cast a necromancy spell of 1st through 5th level that targets only one creature, you can target two creatures within 5 feet of each other instead.
